title: The Chronicles of Epiphany Jones
description: EPIPHANY JONES is living out her Sex and the City fantasy in New York as a magazine editor turned accidental model. With her career as her first love, Epiphany finds it hard to make time for her true love and gets caught up in one triangle after another that keeps her on her toes in every erotic way possible. After she suffers an inconceivable loss, her life, love and her career comes to an abrupt halt until she is presented with an offer she simply cannot refuse. Old loves, new loves, sex, money and secrets makes for an electrifying journey as Epiphany tumbles from one thrilling experience to the next.
author: Kimberley R. Jasper
